title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 106.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Vehicle and Traffic Law section 401 provides for the
registration of most vehicles. Subdivision six provides for the passenger
categories and subdivision seven provides for the commercial categories. Subdivision seven covers "...buses,...motor vehicles constructed or specially
equipped for the transportation of goods, wares and merchandise, commonly known
as auto trucks or light delivery cars,...taxicabs, livery and... certain other
motor vehicles..." Subdivision six covers the registration of most other
vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
106.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
